definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

pinyin: you3 tong3 ji4 xue2 yi4 yi4

sentences.english: Only one state -- Michigan -- saw statistically significant increases in poverty two years in a row.
sentences.chinese: 只有密歇根州连续两年贫困率攀升具有统计学意义。

sentences.english: Did you take statistics at college?
sentences.chinese: 你上大学时学统计学了吗？

sentences.english: Pre-exercise high-fat diet rats in each group body weight was no significant difference.
sentences.chinese: 运动期间，各组高脂饮食大鼠摄食量无统计学意义。

sentences.english: The statistical method used for analysis was exact probabilities in fourfold table.
sentences.chinese: 统计学方法采用四格表的确切概率法。

sentences.english: The statistic methods were t-test and the correlation analysis.
sentences.chinese: 运用t检验和相关分析对计量指标进行统计学分析。

sentences.english: Deterioration in the SRS and ODI scores was of statistical significance.
sentences.chinese: SRS及ODI评分恶化有明显的统计学意义。

sentences.english: Purulent nasal discharge had statistical difference between biyuanshu group and control group.
sentences.chinese: 脓鼻涕鼻渊舒组和对照组有统计学差异。

sentences.english: The new breed of statisticians tackle that problem.
sentences.chinese: 新一代的统计学家让这一问题迎刃而解。

sentences.english: But one group of statisticians begs to differ.
sentences.chinese: 而日前的一组统计学家却有不同看法。

sentences.english: The main purpose is to demonstrate the diversities of statistical applications.
sentences.chinese: 主要是希望能给大家一点统计学应用的感觉。

sentences.english: RKHS will be an essential tool for establishing a connection between Regularization Theory and Statistical Learning Theory.
sentences.chinese: RKHS是结合正规化理论和统计学理论的必要工具。

sentences.english: The difference of knowledgable rate of nutritional knowledge between two groups wasn't of statistical significance.
sentences.chinese: 城市和农村学生的营养知识知晓率差异无统计学意义。

sentences.english: Problems of regression function estimate is a basic problem in statistical theory.
sentences.chinese: 回归估计是统计学中基本问题之一。

sentences.english: Statistics is a fundamental course as well as one of the kernal courses for Finance and Economics majors.
sentences.chinese: 统计学是财经类专业的基础课和核心课之一。

sentences.english: Demographic and surgical data were collected for neurologically monitorable patients.
sentences.chinese: 收集入选患者的人口统计学及外科相关资料。

sentences.english: Scherb, a biostatistician at the German Research Center for Environmental Health in Munich.
sentences.chinese: 国环境与健康研究中心的一位生物统计学家。
